text: KCLA-LP was a low power news/talk radio station broadcasting out of San Pedro, California. ==History== KCLA-LP began broadcasting on March 3, 2013. As of April 2017, the station is off the air. ==References== ==External links== * Category:San Pedro, Los Angeles CLA-LP Category:2015 establishments in California CLA-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2017 disestablishments in California Category:Radio stations disestablished in 2017 Category:Defunct radio stations in the United States CLA-LP
title: KCLA-LP
